house_listing.house_description: This home built in 1981 has 1 bedroom(s), 1 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) . Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.location: On golf course, Lake front, Corner

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Contemporary Style, Dining/Living Combo, Dishwasher, Eat InKitchen, Elevator, Gazebo, Microwave
